match_description: Non‑tech founder meets an engineer who can own the tech stack—idea + coding = complete team.
Small startup needs its first designer/marketer/etc.; candidate wants exactly that role.
Dev, designer, and PM with complementary skills team up to build a project under a deadline.
Academic with a prototype links to a company that can bring it to market—brains + muscle.
Founder seeking funding meets an investor looking for new deals—money meets pitch.
Open‑source lead needs hands on deck; developers want first PR credit.
Agency offers a service; organization needs that scoped expertise.
Freelancer wants short contracts; startup needs quick help—easy win‑win.
SaaS vendor meets the budget‑holder manager—seller + buyer.
Company wants to sponsor; event team needs sponsors—perfect fit.
Fintech founder needs legal setup; lawyer wants clients in tech/finance.
